titles.title: To prohibit the use of members of the United States Armed Forces to carry out offensive combat operations in Syria.
To prohibit the use of members of the United States Armed Forces to carry out offensive combat operations in Syria.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the President from using members of the Armed Forces to carry out offensive combat operations in Syria unless Congress has enacted a specific authorization for such use.
